core_operations.justification: The vulnerability is caused by insufficient checks on segment lengths. This indicates a lack of proper input validation, which should ensure that the length of the input does not exceed the buffer size.

The vulnerability leads to buffer overruns, indicating that the system does not properly manage its buffers. Proper buffer management should prevent overflows by ensuring that data written to the buffer does not exceed its capacity.
The system does not seem to handle the error condition of a buffer overflow properly. Proper error handling should prevent the execution of arbitrary code when a buffer overflow occurs.
